page.title: 14INTERVIEW WITH FARMER'S WIFE
page.content: { The farmer's wife}told us about her daily life. At 6.30 a.m. she gets up and milks the two pet goats. Then she gets a breakfast of cereals & eggs for the family. Next the two children go to school. At midmorning her husband comes in for sandwiches & cake, & later for lunch she will cook a meal, after this she goes to a teaching job. At 3.30p.m. she will pick up the children from school and take them to Cubs and Brownies. When the children come home they go to bed. She milks & feeds the goats, has supper & feeds the dog & cat.If there is time she takes the dog for a walk. Then she marks her school books. {At Harvest time,}tea is taken to the fields.Also it is hard to have a summer holiday because of harvesting. (continued on page 15)
